To apply for admission to RV University:

Required Documents:
‚Ä¢ 12th grade mark sheet (minimum 60%)
‚Ä¢ Transfer certificate
‚Ä¢ ID proof (Aadhar/Passport)
‚Ä¢ 2 passport photos
‚Ä¢ Entrance exam scores (JEE/CET for Engineering)

Apply online at: rvu.edu.in/admissions
Contact: +91-9513673778 / +91-8951179896

Important Admission Dates 2025-26:

üìÖ Application Opens: March 1, 2025
üìÖ Application Deadline: June 30, 2025
üìÖ Entrance Exam: July 15, 2025
üìÖ Results Announcement: July 30, 2025
üìÖ Classes Begin: August 15, 2025

Apply early to secure your seat!

RV University accepts the following entrance exams:

For Engineering (B.Tech):
‚Ä¢ JEE Mains
‚Ä¢ Karnataka CET
‚Ä¢ University entrance test

For Management (MBA):
‚Ä¢ CAT / MAT / CMAT
‚Ä¢ University entrance test

For Other Programs:
‚Ä¢ Program-specific aptitude tests
‚Ä¢ Merit-based admission for some courses

Visit admissions office for specific program requirements.

Eligibility Criteria by Program:

B.Tech / B.Sc (Engineering):
‚Ä¢ 60% in 12th (Physics, Chemistry, Math)
‚Ä¢ Valid JEE/CET score

BBA / B.Com:
‚Ä¢ 50% in 12th (any stream)

Design / Arts:
‚Ä¢ 50% in 12th + Portfolio review

For specific programs, contact: admissions@rvu.edu.in

Application Process (5 Easy Steps):

1Ô∏è‚É£ Visit: rvu.edu.in/apply
2Ô∏è‚É£ Create account with email & phone
3Ô∏è‚É£ Fill personal & academic details
4Ô∏è‚É£ Upload required documents (PDF format)
5Ô∏è‚É£ Pay application fee: ‚Çπ1,500 (online)

‚úÖ You'll receive confirmation email within 24 hours
üì± Track application status in your portal

RV University Fee Structure (Annual):

Engineering (B.Tech):
‚Ä¢ CET Quota: ‚Çπ2,16,000
‚Ä¢ JEE Quota: ‚Çπ5,00,000
‚Ä¢ Management Quota: ‚Çπ9,00,000

Business (BBA/B.Com):
‚Ä¢ BBA: ‚Çπ2,00,000
‚Ä¢ B.Com: ‚Çπ1,65,000

Computer Science (B.Sc):
‚Ä¢ Data Science: ‚Çπ1,60,000
‚Ä¢ AIML: ‚Çπ1,60,000

Design (B.Design): ‚Çπ4,00,000

*Fees exclude hostel, mess, and exam charges

Fee Payment Options:

üí≥ Payment Methods:
‚Ä¢ Online (Credit/Debit card, UPI, Net Banking)
‚Ä¢ Demand Draft (in favor of RV University)
‚Ä¢ Bank transfer

üìÖ Installment Options:
‚Ä¢ Option 1: Full payment (5% discount)
‚Ä¢ Option 2: Two installments (June + December)
‚Ä¢ Option 3: Three installments (June + Oct + Feb)

üí∞ No-cost EMI available for eligible students through partner banks.

Contact finance@rvu.edu.in for assistance.

Scholarship Opportunities at RV University:

üèÜ Merit Scholarships:
‚Ä¢ 90%+ in 12th: 50% tuition waiver
‚Ä¢ 85-90% in 12th: 25% tuition waiver
‚Ä¢ 80-85% in 12th: 10% tuition waiver

üíº Need-Based Scholarships:
‚Ä¢ Up to 30% fee waiver for economically weaker sections
‚Ä¢ Application required with income proof

üéØ Sports/Cultural Scholarships:
‚Ä¢ State/National level achievers: 20-40% waiver

üìù Apply at: rvu.edu.in/scholarships
Deadline: Within 15 days of admission

Hostel Fee Structure:

üè† Accommodation (Per Year):
‚Ä¢ Single occupancy: ‚Çπ1,50,000
‚Ä¢ Double occupancy: ‚Çπ1,00,000
‚Ä¢ Triple occupancy: ‚Çπ75,000

üçΩÔ∏è Mess Charges:
‚Ä¢ ‚Çπ45,000 per year (‚Çπ15,000/semester)
‚Ä¢ 3 meals daily + evening snacks

‚ú® Facilities Included:
‚Ä¢ Wi-Fi, laundry, common room
‚Ä¢ 24/7 security, water, electricity
‚Ä¢ Gym, sports facilities

One-time refundable deposit: ‚Çπ10,000

Fee Refund Policy:

Before Semester Starts:
‚Ä¢ Within 15 days of admission: 90% refund
‚Ä¢ Within 30 days: 70% refund
‚Ä¢ After 30 days: 50% refund

After Semester Starts:
‚Ä¢ Within 7 days: 40% refund
‚Ä¢ After 7 days: No refund

‚ö†Ô∏è Application fee (‚Çπ1,500) is non-refundable
‚ö†Ô∏è Hostel deposit is fully refundable

Process: Submit withdrawal form to admissions office
Refund time: 30-45 working days
